page.title: 02SELE FARM ESTATE-2
page.content: Nearly all the gardens on the estate are kept beautifully & so are the allotments. For entertainment on the estate the Golden Griffin public house is used by the people living nearby & by people living elsewhere in the Hertford. Nearly every house has a television aerial which suggests that a lot of people watch television for entertainment. There are play areas for the children but many of the older ones attend the youth clubs which are held in the Sele School Youth Wing. Adults & families use the Community Centre. Schooling is well catered for on the estate. There is a junior school, St.Andrews, and a secondary school, Sele School. The people in the old folks' home are well looked after. The Sele Farm Estate is a caring community.
